name: !stats [player]
description: Returns general stats for a player

name: ![player category] [player]
description: Returns [player category] stats for a player, e.g. !kills, !deaths, !gunpowder

name: !top [player category]
description: Returns the top 3 players in a category

name: !bottom [player category]
description: Returns the bottom 3 players in a category

name: !parkour [player]
description: Returns the parkour stats for a player

name: !teams [team category]
description: Returns the stats in order for each team in [category]

name: !teamsonline
description: Returns the number of members online per team

name: !tags
description: Returns the amount of tags each team has

name: !online [player]
description: Returns if the player is on the server or not

name: !superlatives [superlative category]
description: Returns the top 3 teams in a superlative category
